name: paint
desc:
Called whenever the object needs to paint. The given Canvas has its
coordinate space configured such that the origin is at the top left of the
box. The area of the box is the size of the size argument.

name: shouldRepaint
desc:
Called whenever a new instance of the custom painter delegate class is
provided to the RenderCustomPaint object, or any time that a new
CustomPaint object is created with a new instance of the custom painter
delegate class (which amounts to the same thing, because the latter is
implemented in terms of the former).

desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: models
desc: This module contains all the models for app

name: Instrument
desc: Instrument is an object model for a music instrument

name: INSTRUMENTS
desc: Static value, contains the instrument available in the app

name: code
desc: Code/Short name of the instrument

name: isActive
desc: True if the instrument is enabled by the user

name: name
desc: Name of the instrument

name: text
desc: Translation of the instrument name

name: LangCode
desc: Language is a model for a human language iso code

name: LANG
desc: Static value, contains the languages available in the app

name: code
desc: ISO code of the language

name: isActive
desc: True if the language is enabled by the user

name: tag
desc: Tag/ShortName for the language

name: Language
desc: Language is a model for a human language

name: code
desc: ISO code of the language

name: traduction
desc: Name of the language

name: Note
desc: Note is a model for a musical note from chromatic scale

name: NOTES
desc: Static value, contains the notes available in the app

name: colorCode
desc: Color or the note in hexadecimal

name: isActive
desc: Note name in international naming convention

name: linkAudioFile
desc: Audio file link

name: name
desc: COUCOU EPITECH

name: position
desc: Range in the complete key

name: text
desc: Note name in others languages

name: textColor
desc: Text color

name: type
desc: Type of note (Tone or SemiTone)

name: SettingsData
desc: SettingsData is an object model that contains user preferences

name: colorMode
desc: true if the player wants colored note to help him

name: handsFreeMode
desc: true if the player plays without hand

name: multipleTryMode
desc: true if the player pwants multiple attemps

name: selectedInstrument
desc: Selected instruments

name: selectedLanguage
desc: Selected languages

name: selectedNotes
desc: Selected notes

name: Translation
desc: Translation is an object model which contains multiple value on different languages for an unique tag

name: tag
desc: Unique tag (name of the translation)

name: translations
desc: Values of translations

name: spotify_models
desc: This module contains all the models needed to communicate with the Spotify API

name: Album
desc: Represents an album in Spotify.

name: Album
desc: Creates an Album instance with the given properties.

name: Album.fromJson
desc: Creates an Album instance from a JSON object.

name: href
desc: The Spotify API endpoint for the album.

name: id
desc: The Spotify ID of the album.

name: images
desc: The list of images associated with the album.

name: name
desc: The name of the album.

name: uri
desc: The Spotify URI of the album.

name: Artist
desc: Represents an artist in Spotify.

name: Artist
desc: Creates an Artist instance with the given properties.

name: Artist.fromJson
desc: Creates an Artist instance from a JSON object.

name: href
desc: The Spotify API endpoint for the artist.

name: id
desc: The Spotify ID of the artist.

name: name
desc: The name of the artist.

name: uri
desc: The Spotify URI of the artist.

name: AudioAnalysis
desc: Represents the audio analysis of a Spotify track.

name: key
desc: Musical key of the track

name: tempo
desc:
Duration of the track in seconds
Tempo of the track in beats per minute (BPM)

name: ImageCover
desc: Represents an image associated with an album in Spotify.

name: ImageCover
desc: Creates an ImageCover instance with the given properties.

name: ImageCover.fromJson
desc: Creates an ImageCover instance from a JSON object.

name: height
desc: The height of the image in pixels.

name: url
desc: The URL of the image.

name: width
desc: The width of the image in pixels.

name: Track
desc: Represents a track in Spotify.

name: Track
desc: Creates a Track instance with the given properties.

name: album
desc: The album in which the track is included.

name: artists
desc: The list of artists who performed the track.

name: audioAnalysis
desc: Indicates if the track is playable.

name: durationMs
desc: The duration of the track in milliseconds.

name: id
desc: The Spotify ID of the track.

name: isPlayable
desc: Indicates if the track is playable.

name: name
desc: The name of the track.

name: popularity
desc: The popularity of the track (0-100).

name: previewUrl
desc: The URL to a preview of the track.
